title: Sunrise in my bathtub
body: The citrus burst feels like stepping into first light. My skin was plush afterward and the shimmer rinsed clean.

title: An evening ceremony
body: This elixir is an instant exhale. I use a few drops as a perfume oil too. Worth every indulgent drop.

title: Spa-grade reset
body: Muscles melt instantly. The menthol is strong but clearing. I alternate with Celestial Tides for balance.
